MAIN_MESSAGE: It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown for safety at 8:53PM in the LL16 and LL22 postcode area of Llansanan following reports of a grounded overhead electrical cable. This may affect the supply to your property. Our engineers are on their way to the local area. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:09PM on 29th March 2021.
